name: A Life Of Reflections
description:
Totally overestimated what I could get done in one weekend, I implemented everything except gameplay. 

This was made in vanilla js and html and all that good stuff, and every little bit of this prototype was made within the timeframe of the jam. Font included.

My theme of choice was "Reflections" and I planned to make the story of the game based on a ghost making his way up the stairway to heaven reflecting  on his past life. Unfortunately I didn't get that far.  As per the jam, there are only ever 2 colors on the screen at one time.

Fully playable in English and Spanish.
